actions.committee: House Committee on Interior and Insular Affairs
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Interior and Insular Affairs.

official_title: A bill to provide for the establishment of the Clara Barton House National Historic Site in the State of Maryland, and for other purposes.

summary.text: Provides for the establishment of the Clara Barton House National Historic Site in Glen Echo, Maryland. Authorizes to be appropriated $47,450 for land acquisition and not to exceed $812,000 for development.

titles.title: A bill to provide for the establishment of the Clara Barton House National Historic Site in the State of Maryland, and for other purposes.
